subject: Aliexpress order number 3061063112100511 - not received
description_text:
Hello,

Recently, I have contacted Simsonn about not receiving my order from the
official Simsonn store on Aliexpress. (email attached)
My order was made September 14, 20203, and it has been more than 20 days
since the expected arrival of the package, and over a month since the
tracking was last updated.
In my last email, I expressed two possible solutions for my side, but
neither one was taken, and Simsonn completely ignored me.
This is my last try to ask you for a solution before I open a customer
ticket on Aliexpress and solve it involving their side, after which it'll
result in my negative review. (not a threat, just an honest opinion from my
side)
I am an old Simsonn customer, and following a good experience from the
past, to be honest, with this order, I feel completely disappointed. There
is no involvement from the Simsonn side, even after contacting you and
expressing my problem!
I have tried to contact you over Aliexpress, but have not even received an
answer to this day!
I often make orders from Aliexpress, and at this point, I'm 100% sure this
one is not arriving at my address and has probably gotten lost somewhere,
as I receive all Aliexpress orders up to 15 days after the order date.
Still, I do not think that I, as a customer, should bear the problems of
it, as I have zero possibility to do anything except contact you as a
seller.

Best regards!
Vlado vrlika

conversations.body_text: Hi Vlado Vrlika,    Your order includes 3 VAM units and 1 power supply. According to the platform, the package was delivered on September 22. Could you please confirm whether the shipping address you provided is correct?

Hello,

I just checked and the address that I have provided is correct.
Package was definitely not delivered to me.

Best regards!
Vlado Vrlika

On Mon, Oct 27, 2025 at 12:39 AM support@simsonn.com

Hi Vlado Vrlika,    Please don’t worry. We have just received your message regarding this issue. We will contact the logistics company today to investigate, and if the package is confirmed lost, we will arrange a replacement order for you.

Hello,

I expect that package will be confirmed lost, but as I have already been
waiting for some time, and if I would have to wait for a new one to arrive,
I would accept that if my order would be upgraded to VAM Pro set of two
with power supplie, otherwise, I would request a full refund because I can
get a similar product as VAM Motors much sooner than waiting again for
these ones to arrive.

Best regards!
Vlado Vrlika

pon, 27. lis 2025. 00:49 support@simsonn.com

Hello,

Any updates from the logistics company?

Hi Vlado Vrlika, Hello, since the platform logistics has not been updated for a long time, it is recommended that you can directly file a dispute regarding the non-updated logistics and apply for a refund at the AliExpress platform order section, and the platform will intervene to handle it.
